text:
build.sh doesn't take the ant shipped with lenya and fails to build because of
missing jars of systems ant.
creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com

text:
Created attachment 18734
set no_config=true in ant

to prevent ant from using the systems ant.conf this patch turns off using a
config.
creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com

text:
applied patch in r432591.
thanks Simon!
creator: josias.thoeny@wyona.org
